name: Dorito CLICKER v2
description:
- Dorito CLICKER v2 is a casual game where you can click your way to Dorito glory in your never-ending quest to hoard as many Doritos as possible!

- The new version includes a new settings feature that allows you to change the background color of the game screen according to your preference.

- We also added a start button so you can choose when to begin your Dorito adventure, and a Fullscreen feature so you can enjoy the game on a larger screen.

- Another change is that we removed the multiple Doritos option and made each Dorito give you points when you click on it. There is also a Golden Dorito that appears randomly and gives you extra points and extra time, but it moves faster and faster as you progress, challenging you to catch it.

- We improved the compatibility and performance of the game by adding JavaScript and CSS code to make it sleeker and more user-friendly.
